title: Mike Hebrew with new Latin characters to match
content:
Well I have at last got around to designing a Latin character set for Mike Hebrew.  
I have put an example of Mike Hebrew Regular on the Critique forum.

[http://typophile.com/node/65840](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414070507/http:/typophile.com/node/65840)

Please pull no punches!  
Mike
author: Michael Cunliff...
